name: ListRecentPublicGists
description:
Retrieve the most recently updated public gists.

Call this tool to get a list of public gists on GitHub sorted by the most recent updates. Useful for accessing the latest shared code snippets or projects made publicly available on GitHub.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: A timestamp in ISO 8601 format to filter gists updated after this time.

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of gists to display per page. Maximum allowed is 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: result_page_number
parameters.description: Page number to fetch the results from. Use for pagination.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
